The champion's lamp is an item obtained from the Chest of Champions in the north side of the Champions' Challenge area after defeating a champion.

Rubbing the lamp awards the player ten times the experience that is given immediately after a champion's defeat. For example, rubbing a lamp obtained after defeating the Hobgoblin Champion will award players with 2,320 Hitpoints and Slayer experience. Players will receive a confirmation message before gaining the experience.

If players were to somehow lose the lamp, it can be reclaimed from the Chest of Champions.

[[File:Champion's lamp detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''champion's lamp''' is an item obtained from the Chest of Champions in the north side of the [[Champions' Challenge]] area after defeating a champion.

Rubbing the lamp awards the player ten times the experience that is given immediately after a champion's defeat. For example, rubbing a lamp obtained after defeating the [[Hobgoblin Champion]] will award players with 2,320 [[Hitpoints]] and [[Slayer]] experience. Players will receive a confirmation message before gaining the experience.

If players were to somehow lose the lamp, it can be reclaimed from the [[Chest of Champions]].
